name: Digital Banking Forum
content: On the Digital Banking Forum, the attendees will be presented with a number of sessions on todayâ€™s current issues and trends, industry best practices seeking to address common challenges, and knowledge-sharing opportunities. The goal of the conference is to uncover the insights of the most emerging topics. Our expert speakers will provide an insight into their experiences throughout interesting keynote presentations, case studies, Q&A, networking sessions and interactive panel discussion. This summit will have a strong focus on personalization and new digital business models, practical AI elements, customer data in the new era of open banking.
topics: Banking finance fintech and regulations financial
